document_data.mainbody:
hief Kiros was the leader of the centaurs of Guard in Bloodstone Barony in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He had a grizzled, slow-talking, but powerful personality. He was always terribly formal and precise. 
Kiros was a kind of sage about history, warfare, and nature. He served as the leader of Guards Council of Elders, which included War Chief Valon and Elder Shinar.
By 1358 DR, Kiros had led his village in joining the Alliance of Belt Watchers with alongside the halflings of Waukeshire and the dwarves of Clan Orothiar. That year, Kiros and his fellows met Gareth Dragonsbanes party.
